Headline: #157 Streeterville/Taylor Temporary Northbound Reroute near Mies Van Der Rohe Way/Chicago
ShortDescription: Northbound 157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Mies Van Der Rohe, Pearson, Dewitt and Chestnut: near Mies Van Der Rohe Way/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Mies Van Der Rohe, Pearson, Dewitt, Chestnut and over regular route: due to police activity near Mies Van Der Rohe Way/Chicago.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Southbound Reroute near Halsted/127th
ShortDescription: Southbound 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 127th and Vermont: due to street blockage near Halsted/127th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

Southbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 127th, Vermont and over regular route: due to street blockage near Halsted/127th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Experiencing Delays; Boarding change at Howard
ShortDescription: Yellow Line service running w/delays due to track switching problems at Howard; board all trains on the Howard-bound Red Line side at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line service is running with delays due to track switching problems at Howard.

Board/exit all trains on the Howard-bound Red Line side of the platform at Howard station.

We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Experiencing Delays; Boarding change between Illinois Medical District and Kedzie
ShortDescription: Blue Line is running w/delays due to a police investigation at Western (FP); board all trains on O'Hare-bound side at Medical District & Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service is running w/delays due to a police investigation at Western (Forest Park Branch).

Trains, in both directions, are running on the same track between Illinois Medical District and Kedzie stations.

Board/exit all trains on the O'Hare-bound side of the platform at Illinois Medical District and Kedzie.

  • As a result of the delay, Blue Line trains will bypass the Western (Forest Park Branch) station in both directions.

Also, shuttle buses are available from Illinois Medical District to Kedzie (Forest Park Branch) to provide connecting service in both directions.

We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
